text: Many years ago, I lived in a Hotel in NYC. And late at night, sometimes in the elevator, I used to bump into a famous singer there, a young woman, who entertained thousands so gracefully and so gloriously. And I would look at her in the elevator, and she would look at me. I knew that she was actually looking for Kris Kristofferson but she would, well maybe she'd settle for me...

This is a song called "The Law". There is no escaping from the Law. There is a Law, there is an extension of the Law, and there is the actuality of the Law. There is a Law, there is an arm, there is a hand.
